content.text:
[@austin](@EaYYQo5nAQRabB9nxAn5i2uiIZ665b90Qk2U/WHNVE8=.ed25519) said:

> 0.0.0.0 redirects to localhost automatically.

Do you have this problem with other programs? I don't think sbot/patchfoo could even do this without root access, and it's usually the type of thing that would be managed by the OS. Any chance you're running any non-obvious network tools or have a special network configuration? I'm thinking VPN utilities, mesh internet clients, or port forwarding dev tools that might be messing with your ports.
